title: Video Editing In My College Days
content: Technology has come a long way in terms of video editing. It evolved beyond merely piecing a movie together to adding sound effects, filters, and words or photos to the movie. As time goes on, I absolutely enjoyed taking the responsibilities as a video editor. I also observed to myself that my video editing skills developed and improved everytime I finished a video.

In my college, I have done multiple films for our project in our course mainly for Multimedia and Social and Professional Issues in Information Technology. I am always eager in bringing my creativity into the reality of editing using Adobe Premiere Pro.
Here are the projects that I have finished in some of my course in IT:
endnotes: I would also like to thank all of my groupmates that puts the best collaboration in our table to make our project possible.
